attributes.additional_details:
There were similar arguments when we switched from a 6 to 5 day work week and it turned out to be beneficial for everyone.
Here's an article with opinions from a doctor on the matter:
http://www.theguardian.com/society/2014/jul/01/uk-four-day-week-combat-stress-top-doctor
attributes.background: This could lower unemployment while also reducing the stress of a demanding job by re balancing the distribution of work. A shorter week is beneficial to mental health, and productivity may also increase given the same number of man hours due to a happier and more motivated workforce.
